title: How to Get Control of Your Time and Your Life
description: What do Gloria Steinem and I.B.M. have in common? Both have sought the advice of Alan Lakein, famous time management expert, in order to minimize the time they waste and to maximize their productive capabilities. Now his practical widwom and amazingly effective simple rules are available to you:How to build your willpowerHow to waste time for pleasure and profitHow to work smarter, not harderAnd much, much moreReading this book can be the wisest investment of your time that you have ever made!
author: Alan Lakein
